alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Massac; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:46AM CST until January 12 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Massac County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Alexander County in southern Illinois... Northern Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Ballard County in western Kentucky... Western McCracken County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 230 AM CST. * At 145 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located from just west of Cairo to just west of Wickliffe, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Cairo, Mounds and Mound City around 155 AM CST. Wickliffe around 200 AM CST. Barlow around 205 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include La Center, Lovelaceville, Barkley Regional Airport and West Paducah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 14. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 19 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
